Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants retroactive membership in the New York city teachers' retirement system to certain employees
Summary: Grants retroactive Tier IV membership in the New York city teachers' retirement system to certain employees employed by the city of Yonkers parks department for the period beginning in 2009 and ending in 2014.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive Tier IV membership in the New York city teachers' retirement system to certain employees
